current_task.title: Fix Chat Visibility, Input Clearing, and Unwatch Button Issues
current_task.description:
Three related issues reported in FEEDBACK.md:

1. CHAT MESSAGES NOT VISIBLE TO OTHER MEMBERS:
   - Root cause: Matrix room ID not properly shared between users
   - In Chat.jsx:144, matrixRoomId comes from sessionStorage ('hush_matrixRoomId')
   - When users join an existing room, they may not be joining the same Matrix room
   - Need to verify Matrix room ID is properly propagated to all room members
   - Likely the Home.jsx join flow doesn't store the correct Matrix room ID

2. CHAT INPUT TEXT REMAINS AFTER SENDING:
   - Chat.jsx:217 calls setInputText('') which should work
   - Possibly a timing/state issue - verify the message actually sends successfully
   - Check if there's a React strict mode double-render issue
   - Add error logging to see if sendMessage is failing silently

3. UNWATCH ('X') BUTTON NOT WORKING:
   - In Room.jsx:569-573, onUnwatch callback uses stream.producerId
   - But allStreams array (line 419-427) sets id: trackSid, not producerId
   - Property name mismatch: stream.producerId is undefined
   - Fix: Change onUnwatch={() => unwatchScreen(stream.producerId)} to unwatchScreen(stream.id)
   - OR: Add producerId property when building allStreams

2. Chat input text remains after sending - possible state/timing issue
3. 'X' unwatch button not working - property name mismatch (stream.producerId vs stream.id)

Root causes identified:
- Room.jsx:571 uses stream.producerId but allStreams uses stream.id
- Chat.jsx may have Matrix room sync issues between users
- Input clearing works but may be failing silently on send errors
